name: System Shield
description:
The system is being infested with bugs and it's up to you to slow them down!

Allocate your resources between Health, Speed, Rate Of Fire, Damage, and Projectile Speed. Then head out and see how long you can last before your file is corrupted.

Made During the Brackeys game jam 2023.1 with the theme of "An end is a new Beginning"

Third party assets:

Synty Prototype pack

Free Music Bundle by neocrey

various sound effects from ProductionCrate.com
